topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53e523906368727a3c6d0100#post_53e523906368727a3c6d0100

it was a guy called tyrone, basically he had a service where he would say almost whatever you wanted him to say (along with an image) for 5 bucks.

4chan found him and basically gave him all his weaboo money for him to say shit like:

"this":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9zZjSMED0IE
"or this":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-rfs4f4vjUw
"or this":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XG0erhuG4HU
"or this":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7-MDuM8HvJ8

also there was this guy called rog

"rog":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ee2WUJYdQWM
